name: <mm::vm_space::UserPtConfig as mm::page_table::PageTableConfig>::item_from_raw

mm::page_prop::PrivilegedPageFlags::cont.doc: Returns `true` if all of the flags in `other` are contained within `self`.

mm::vm_space::VmItem::new_untracked_io.doc: Creates a new `VmItem` that maps an untracked I/O memory.

mm::frame::Frame::<M>::from_raw.doc:
Restores a forgotten [`Frame`] from a physical address.

 # Safety

 The caller should only restore a `Frame` that was previously forgotten using
 [`Frame::into_raw`].

 And the restoring operation should only be done once for a forgotten
 [`Frame`]. Otherwise double-free will happen.

 Also, the caller ensures that the usage of the frame is correct. There's
 no checking of the usage in this function.

mm::vm_space::VmItem::new_tracked.doc: Creates a new `VmItem` that maps a tracked frame.
